txt.en: Scouts of the White Hand patrol outside the encampment in the Balewood, ready to ambush any that would try to depose the White Hand presence in the region.
You have defeated the scouts of the White Hand and cleared a path to their encampment. Through your efforts, the Balewood may yet be reclaimed.

Sentries of the White Hand patrol the Balewood outside their camp, and stand ready to alert the greater force of any threat to their operation.\n\nIf the Ents are to mount an assault against the White Hand in the Balewood, the scouts must be silenced.

Balewood sentries can be found outside Drû Vádokan in north-west Balewood.\n\nScouts of the White Hand patrol the forest and seek to silence any that stand against their master's vile designs. They must be defeated if the Balewood is to be reclaimed.
You have slain many scouts of the White Hand and paved a way for a greater assault into Drû Vádokan.
